content: a beginner-friendly crochet pattern for a soft little octopus friend this pattern is free although i appreciate tips of any size and includes a detailed photo tutorial along with a short-form version of the pattern you can use any kind of yarn you want the materials listed are what i used to get the result in the photos use an appropriate hook size and keep gauge so that stuffing doesn t show through the size of your kraken will depend on the yarn and hook size you use this pattern is freely available on ko-fi com/bizarrelittlemew 1 and is for personal use only you may not sell copy rewrite or distribute any part of this pattern including pictures you may sell finished items made based on this pattern but i request that you credit me 1 https //ko-fi com/bizarrelittlemew/shop
